channel.title: Python on Hailey Gryka
channel.description: Recent content in Python on Hailey Gryka

item.title: Plotting London Boroughs
item.description: Introduction This Rmarkdown document shows the use of both R and Python for analyzing the London Boroughs dataset. The reticulate library allows us to use Python code in an R environment. Load Libraries library(tidyverse) ## -- Attaching packages ------------------------------ tidyverse 1.3.0 -- ## v ggplot2 3.3.2 v purrr 0.3.4 ## v tibble 3.0.3 v dplyr 1.0.0 ## v tidyr 1.1.0 v stringr 1.4.0 ## v readr 1.3.1 v forcats 0.
